```{r tab1, cache=cacheon}

tab1_tmp <- CreateTableOne(
  vars = tabvars,
  strata = "sos_ddr_raasiarni",
  data = pop
)
tab1 <- print(tab1_tmp,
  varLabels = TRUE, missing = TRUE, printToggle = FALSE, nonnormal = tabvars,
  test = TRUE,
  catDigits = 1, contDigits = 1,
  explain = FALSE
)

tab1m_tmp <- CreateTableOne(
  vars = tabvars,
  strata = "sos_ddr_mra",
  data = pop
)
tab1m <- print(tab1m_tmp,
  varLabels = TRUE, missing = TRUE, printToggle = FALSE, nonnormal = tabvars,
  test = TRUE,
  catDigits = 1, contDigits = 1,
  explain = FALSE
)

tab1out <- as_tibble(cbind(rownames(tab1), tab1[, 5], tab1[, c(1:3)], tab1m[, c(1:3)]), 
                     .name_repair = "universal")
#tab1out <- as_tibble(cbind(rownames(tab1), tab1[, 6], tab1[, c(1:2, 5, 3)]))

tab1out <- tab1out %>%
  mutate(
    tmp_varsforfoot = ...1,
    ...1 = sub("  ", ". ", ...1),
    ...1 = sanitizeTextFunc(...1)
  )


## add fotnote stating which variables are used in adj models

tab1out$...1 <- ifelse(stri_extract_first_words(tab1out$tmp_varsforfoot) %in% modvars,
  paste0(tab1out$...1, footnote_marker_symbol(1)), tab1out$...1
)

tab1out <- tab1out %>% select(-tmp_varsforfoot)

## white space removed in kable function.
## fix in order to use escape = TRUE

colnames(tab1out) <- sanitizeTextFunc(c(
  "Variables", "Missing (%)", rep(c("No", "Yes", "p-value"), 2)
))

write.xlsx(tab1out, paste0("./output/tabs/tab1_", Sys.Date(), ".xlsx"), rowNames = FALSE)


myHeader <- c(" " = 1, " " = 1, "RAASi incl ARNI" = 3, "MRA" = 3)
names(myHeader) <- c(" ", " ", "RAASi incl ARNI", "MRA")


footnote(
  mykable(tab1out,
    fontsize = 6,
    caption = "Baseline characteristics",
    longtable = TRUE,
    escape = FALSE
  ) %>%
    landscape() %>%
    add_header_above(myHeader),
  general = c(
    "Categorical variables are presented with n (%) and tested with chi-square test and continuous variables with median [q1-q3] and tested with Mann-Whitney U test."
  ),
  symbol = c(
   "Included in the logistic regression models."
  )
)
```
